templates.name: Which refill do I need?
templates.content: You can use our Refill Finder here: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/categories/refills/refill-finder If you let me know which writing instrument you have, I'll be happy to check for you.

templates.name: Do you have a repair shop?
templates.content:
To ensure the highest quality of service and care when your item needs to be repaired or serviced, Montblanc has partnered with My Jewelry Repair. My Jewelry Repair specializes in repairs for all Montblanc products including Writing Instruments, Watches, Leather Goods, and Accessories, and accepts Montblanc products from everywhere across the United States.

To request a repair online with My Jewelry Repair for your Montblanc item, please access this link - https://montblanc.attn.tv/sl/No_gwqVH/

You can also contact My Jewelry Repair directly by calling 833-625-1930 Monday to Friday between 12 PM to 8 PM ET or by email at montblancservice@myjewelryrepair.com for all inquiries related to repairing your product.

You can also bring your Montblanc product to a Montblanc boutique. Please use our Store Locator tool - https://montblanc.attn.tv/sl/TW41O7gx to find your nearest boutique.

For additional Montblanc authorized repair locations for watches in the United States, please check here for a list of locations: https://montblanc.attn.tv/sl/_La6BPiy

templates.name: Products too expensive
templates.content: Thanks for your feedback, I'll share future offers that may interest you since we'd love to change your mind! If you have any questions just reach out and I'd love to help!

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/contact-us Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you offer gift vouchers?
templates.content: I'm afraid gift vouchers cannot be purchased online. However, we do offer gift vouchers in our boutiques. You can find a boutique near you here: https://stores.montblanc.com/storelocator?locale=eng&defaultLat=40.141230747646&defaultLng=-101.810657762798&defaultZoom=4

templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO addresses?
templates.content: At this time we are unable to ship orders to APO/FPO addresses.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I'm afraid once an order has been confirmed, it is processed automatically and cannot be canceled or modified. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause!

templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
templates.content: At this time we are unable to ship orders to P.O. Boxes.

templates.name: Can I have my product engraved or embossed after I receive it?
templates.content: Yes, we offer personalization services in most of our boutiques. Please note, you may be charged for this service. Please check with your nearest boutique for further information: https://stores.montblanc.com/storelocator?locale=eng&defaultLat=40.141230747646&defaultLng=-101.810657762798&defaultZoom=4

templates.name: Is engraving or embossing available online?
templates.content: We do indeed offer complimentary personalization at the time of purchase for the products that have noted 'Free Personalisation' under the product image.

templates.name: Can I choose a delivery date or time?
templates.content: Unfortunately, it is not possible to choose a specific date and time.

templates.name: Can I make an exchange?
templates.content: Currently, the only way to exchange a product is to return it and place a new order.

templates.name: Do you offer gift wrapping?
templates.content:
Each item purchased online is wrapped in our signature Montblanc packaging. You will also receive a blank branded card for you to leave a hand-written note. Please note that exceptions are made for refills, notebooks, and diaries.
 
For gift orders to be directly delivered to the recipient, you can add free gift wrapping and a personal message in your Shopping Bag. Enter the text into the "Gift Message" field; we will print it on an A6 Montblanc card.
 
The invoice won't be included in the delivery and will be sent to you via the email address you provided.

templates.name: Can I combine returns from different orders?
templates.content: Sure, you can use the same box and pre-paid label. You can find more information about our return procedures on the Return Policy page here: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/returns-and-refunds

templates.name: What is the color of engraving or embossing?
templates.content: We offer various options in our personalization service. In general, the engraving or embossing will be done in the color that matches the fittings. You may also opt for "blind" which means without color. We also offer silver or gold foil engraving or embossing.

templates.name: Can I use my own return service?
templates.content:
You can certainly use a different courier than the one that delivered the package. Please send the return to the following address: 

YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
125 Delawanna Avenue
Clifton, NJ 07014
New Jersey

templates.name: Will my package contain the invoice
templates.content: It will only contain the ordered goods and warranty documents. Your invoice was included as a PDF in your Shipping Confirmation email.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to contact us via this link: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/contact-us Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/returns-and-refunds

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer complimentary standard shipping on all domestic orders.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (800) 995-4810, Monday-Friday from 9am - 9pm and Saturday from 9:30am - 6pm ET, or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/montblanc/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/montblanc

templates.name: How do I return the items?
templates.content: Please fill out our return form at the following link in order to get a return number: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/pex/searchorder/index Use the pre-paid UPS Return Label included in your order and leave the package at a UPS drop-off location.

templates.name: Can I order online and pick up the order in store?
templates.content:
During the checkout process select "Pick up in boutique" and choose which boutique you would like to have your order delivered to. You will receive an email as soon as your order is ready to be picked up at the boutique.

In order to pick up your order, you will need to bring with you a valid ID and the shipping confirmation email (printed or on a mobile device).

templates.name: May I return an engraved or embossed product?
templates.content: Personalized items with engraving or embossing are final sale and cannot be returned or exchanged except when due to a product defect.

templates.name: Where do you ship my order from?
templates.content: We ship all orders from our U.S. distribution center.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us near you here: https://stores.montblanc.com/storelocator?locale=eng&defaultLat=40.141230747646&defaultLng=-101.810657762798&defaultZoom=4

templates.name: Where is my return?
templates.content: You can check the status of your return at any time on the Follow your Return page: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/account/myreturn

templates.name: Can I return my online order at one of your stores?
templates.content: You can return items purchased at Montblanc e-boutique to a boutique within 20 days, just follow the steps on this link: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/boutique-services-faq

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/account/searchorder

templates.name: I decided to keep my order but I filled out the return form
templates.content: We are glad you have decided to keep your purchase. Don't worry, you don't have to do anything and there is no need to contact our customer support team.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! I'm afraid we don't have any specific discounts like that.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2-3 business days and we usually ship via UPS. Once shipped it will take 5-8 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Is the item available in the XX store?
templates.content: I would highly suggest clicking on the "Check availability in boutiques" link on the product page to see if inventory is available. You'll also have the ability to reserve the item in-store. Just fill out the form and you will be contacted by our staff to confirm availability.

templates.name: If someone likes gel pens, would the rollerball ink pen be a similar choice?
templates.content: Rollerball has a smooth glide like a gel pen. Also, a fineliner has a felt tip point and feels like a fine marker. You can read more about rollerball pens here: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/discover/campaign/ballpoint-vs-rollerball-pens Hope this helps!

templates.name: Warranty Policy
templates.content: You can check out our warranty policy here: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/warranty

templates.name: Do the pens come with a pouch?
templates.content: Our packaging does not include a pouch. The box can be used for storing the pen when not in use.

templates.name: How long does personalization take?
templates.content: For online orders, personalization adds one business day to processing. In our boutiques, personalization is available with purchase and can take about an hour.

templates.name: Why does my confirmation email only show the street name of the address?
templates.content: For security reasons, the confirmation email only includes the street name.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://www.montblanc.com/en-us/customer-service/contact-us.html Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Retroactive discount request
templates.content: Unfortunately, we are unable to apply discounts retroactively. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause!
